CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: When CB was used as the solvent , all the combinations showed a relatively low PCE of 0.87% , 1.97% and 1.92% in the devices with PDTP-BT : PC 70 BM , PDTP - DTBT : PC 70 BM and PDTP-DT2BT : PC 70 BM respectively.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| CB (as solvent) |
| PDTP-BT |
| PC 70 BM |
| PDTP-DTBT |
| PDTP-DT2BT |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| CB (as solvent) |
| PDTP-BT: PC 70 BM |
| PDTP-DTBT: PC 70 BM |
| PDTP-DT2BT: PC 70 BM |

Note: In the given paragraph, "PDTP-BT: PC 70 BM", "PDTP-DTBT: PC 70 BM", and "PDTP-DT2BT: PC 70 BM" are compound material names, where "PDTP-BT", "PDTP-DTBT", and "PDTP-DT2BT" are the abbreviated material names, and "PC 70 BM" is the abbreviation for a specific type or batch of a polymer material. Therefore, they are presented as single entities in the table.
